activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#426
activity.text:
In my opinion #347 was concerned about design of landing page and #399 for the search results page, as the PR which got merged left some UX issues which should be fixed here(after maintainers approve the mockup solution)
Followed by fixing the landing page, the search results page must be updated(#399 )

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#426
activity.text:
Sure, I will be providing a mockup of the solution soon.
As of #399 it should follow up to sync with the landing page design

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#425

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#419
activity.text:
> [@samidc1992](https://github.com/samidc1992) This should be focused, right?
> 
> ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/91fe8fab-9744-4022-8b23-a47f2d7b1843)

The href  `#nutrition_card`( didn't focus anywhere).
Further as I was exploring IDs, I came upon `#nova` which was the correct container that it must focus as verified by @samidc1992 
If you want any other changes, I am open to make changes as per the need.

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#421
activity.text: There is already `VITE_OFF_BASE_URL` in .env file, if you want a similar way to run the PricesApi locally #424 does this for you

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#425
activity.text:
Yeah @akashshetty1997 this will probably fix this issue, using a fallback for `grade` whenever it is undefined/null.
As it becomes undefined, the map will destructure `bgColor` where the issue actually was arised(console error)

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#425

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#407
activity.text:
The `flex` class was missing from the main container div that holds the tags, which causes the overlap.
It used `flex-wrap` which is a flex property, but the container wasn't a flex container in the first place itself.

open_prs.title: fix: Nova card not targeting specific panel ID
fix: overlapping tags in edit page
fix: type errors fixed in a product which fails to fetch
chore: added quality checks for nutrition
feat: added the new user API with improved login usability
feat: implemented real-time Energy Calculation in edit page
